Summary: look like glowstix flying south to north. west of my house
divs: Sighting Details viewed by my wife while on pool deck looking towards west. Her best description was a glowstix green in color but perpendicular to ground. flew south to north. was prpb over gulf of mexico.lost sight behind a tree. no. sound. could not tellhow big it was. saw plane few. minutes late but nothimg else
